ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Snatch.xcworkspace -scheme Snatch -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -destination 'name=iPhone 12 mini'
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 12 mini

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Snatch.xcworkspace -scheme Snatch -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -destination 'name=iPhone 12 mini'
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 12 mini
